attributes.description: The relative match of the target term with respect to the mapped text item. Result meanings:
attributes.name: match

attributes.description: Purpose of the mapping e.g. 'automated data mining', 'billing', 'interoperability'.
attributes.name: purpose

attributes.description: The target term of the mapping.
attributes.name: target

functions.meaning: The mapping is to a narrower term.
functions.name: narrower

functions.meaning: The mapping is to a broader term.
functions.name: broader

functions.meaning: The mapping is to an equivalent term.
functions.name: equivalent

functions.meaning: The kind of mapping is unknown.
functions.name: unknown

meta_info.description: Represents a coded term mapped to a `DV_TEXT`, and the relative match of the target term with respect to the mapped item. Plain or coded text items may appear in the EHR for which one or mappings in alternative terminologies are required. Mappings are only used to enable computer processing, so they can only be instances of `DV_CODED_TEXT`.
meta_info.name: TERM_MAPPING
